thag1.10:1.1_0: A knowledge master, peaceful and self-controlled,
thag1.10:1.2_0: is rid of concern for this world and the world beyond.
thag1.10:1.3_0: Unsullied in the midst of all things,
thag1.10:1.4_0: they’d know the arising and passing of the world.
thag1.10:1.5_0: That is how this verse was recited by the senior venerable Puṇṇamāsa.
